title: can anyone please tell me how to win against quinn
body: im a mid lane main so i dont go against her in lane but after she hits 6 and runs around with lethality items and stormrazer i find it very hard to shut her down with anyone i play i mean how can i avoid her running out of no where with her ult, vaulting off of me (automatcially getting her passive stack) blinding me point blank and 2 shotting me before the blind even wears off i just need someone to tell me how to shut down the enmy quinn because every game shes in i lose because shes basically adc talon. someone please help.

replies.body: Just group with your team and ward deep to see her rotate.

running through team minion waves causes them to hit her, slowing down her ult speed. if you have some kind of skill shot like a {{champion:117}}. Use that on her which slows her down as well. If you're playing {{champion:50}} there's no excuse to miss a skillshot unless you're just bad with him. Good luck.
